Important: If you are planning to use an External Security Manager (ESM), such as IBM Resource Access Control Facility for z/VM (RACF/VM), you must not enable Auto Warm IPL until your ESM is fully configured. Note: If you are planning to use Temporary Disks (T-Disk), for compliance reasons, modify the default on SYSTEM CONFIG, which enables the clean up. Note: The assignment is through the CP SET command, SET PF12 RETRIEVE. By pressing PF12, a command is retrieved and written back into the command area on the terminal screen. You likely do not need to change these settings. Note: The z/VM 7.2 default for Password_on_Cmds were changed to NO. Chapter 6.
